title: LF Casual Duo Partner Leading Into New Season (Support/Plat)
body:
Basically I am just looking for someone who might be interested in maybe duo'ing in normals ect, until the new season comes out.

I am currently a plat 5 adc main, and just looking for anyone who is chill, enjoys playing support and looking for someone to have some 'bot lane synergy' with. 

All that I ask is that you at least be plat, or even high gold, I don't really care, just would like someone I can maybe look to duo with coming into the new season and would like to stick around and just rek some kids next season.

Cheers buds.

IGN: FIGJAMpAnAnAz
